titleStmt.title: To the magistrates and people of England vvhere this may come What is the matter with the Christians of our age, ...
titleStmt.author: Fox, Margaret Askew Fell, 1614-1702.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption title and first line of text.
Signed and dated at end: The 7. day of the 4. month, 1664. Margret Fell.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
